attributes.action: Make radicals forfeit their right to British citizenship and deport them.
attributes.background: Radicalisation is a threat to British lives.  Those who want to join Isis should be allowed to leave the country but forfeit their right to British citizenship. Anyone radicalising others or becoming a radical should be deported and forfeit their right to British citizenship and a British passport.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
